comment:
Met Suryansh for the first time in HJB, and he’s been a great friend ever since.
Dar mat, call kardenge bhai tereko jab college se nikal jayenge.
name: R Harsh

comment: A very funny and chill dude, also a highly focused individual. All the best !
name: Suraj Kumar Yadav

comment: The "smiling boy" of our class 😂, funny and entertaining. Humble and friendly, I wish you best for future!
name: Sanjit Vyas

comment: Suryansh, sasta artist and anime aficionado, is always ready for adventure. A master in the kitchen ('Bhai, sandwich banade!'), With a running style that's pure comedy gold, he's always up for trips ('Bhai, Goa chlenge?').From Tincha to the best memories, he's the most helpful and fun dance partner.
name: Gaveesh Garg

comment: The dashing charmer, also boasts exceptional artistic talents. World-class cricket player. His knack for injecting humor into any scenario, albeit with unconventional examples, turns every gathering into a lively affair. Wishing you all the best for your future endeavors! Keep in touch!
name: Yuvaraj Merugu

comment: Thulyansh! "Struggling artist but still keeps smiling🙃! Kind at heart (gharse khana aur sweet latta hai bhai). The most handsome guy in the group but least confident 😂.Bumrah in every sport except bowling🙂, Keep smiling, "Hope to see you soon, in Kashmir. Sorry, Jammu 😂."
name: Sanket Bhajgawali

comment: A phenomenal artist, the ultimate anime buddy, and apparently a morning alarm for many of us. His cheerful demeanor and perpetual smile never fails to brighten any situation. Above all the best motivator and  the greatest actor in Dumb Charades😊.  Wish you all the very best for the future buddy✌️✌.
name: Ritik Raj Soni

comment: Chupa Rustam!, U'd have never showed us ur art 🔥, if I hadn't check ur tablet. Ur art made me obsessed with sketches. From first meet in quarantine hostel, till the end of college, ur qualities amazed me artist, chef, swimmer, fitness guy . Hope to see u soon😊
name: Omraj Dhore

comment: Sabse pro artist aur mechanical ka sabse handsome boy. BTP partner ho to tere jesa. Bhul mt Jana bro yad rakhna aur ha smile krte rehna acha lagta hai 😂.
name: BHUPESH KUMAR

comment:
Skilled artist. 
TT ka Bumrah😂
Ghar ka chhota beta(izat nahi hai inki😂)
Har chiz ke liye pehle manao isse.
Most kind-hearted and helpful guy and feels good to be around.
See you soon brother! best wishes.
name: Dev Verma

comment: My first roommate and the first person to talk with me. You made me feel welcome on the first day bro and you are a really good friend. Hope we can meet up in the future. Good Luck Bro.
name: V Rajkumar Thomas
